item.title: [网络开发]Raknet文档翻译(1)——Startup
item.description: 开始Raknet [cpp] StartupResult RakPeer::Startup( unsigned short maxConnections, SocketDescriptor * socketDescriptors,unsigned socketDescriptorCount, int threadPriority ); [/cpp] 第一件你应该做的事情是调用RakpeerInterface::StartUp()函数，Start
